title: Pls nerf heimer
body: After played as heimer a bit over my years of league and he's been a rather easy to play champ. I feel though he has too much health on his turrets and they deal too much damage, I feel that it is to easy to get them out and keep them out as the out range many champs and are quite hard to target. As teemo lvl 1 bs heimer lvl 1 it took 4 shots to kill 1 turret.

replies.body: He falls off heavily late game. He has barely any late game utility or damage. Just a moderate throughout the game.
just play smart against heimerdinger. once he leaves his turrets he's as good as dead. if you pay attention you can just read his movements and realise when he is going to throw out skillshots.
He needs a nerf alright.Champ is just straight up broken.Someone jumps on your R>Q>ZHONYAS = PENTAKILL XD basically

Those turrets do have a cooldown. Remember to clear them before engaging on their team, or bait the upgraded turret and disengage. The key to beating a Heimerdinger is not playing his game and destroying those turrets whenever possible.
